document_data.name: Sleeping Hollow
document_data.mainbody: '''Sleeping Hollow''' was an [[Arn]] settlement on the [[Arnrock]] volcano in the [[Lake of Steam]] through the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The settlement was the closest thing to a town on the island, although it was more appropriate to call it a ramshackle collection of small homes and boarding houses.
document_data.History: Sleeping Hollow was obliterated when the Arnrock erupted in the {{YearlinkName|1386}}.
document_data.Notable Locations: The "town" was home to the [[Brazen Buck]], which was not just the only inn and the only tavern, but also the only establishment that catered to non-halflings on the island.
document_data.Inhabitants: Sleeping Hollow—and indeed the whole Arnrock—was home to the Arn, a population of interrelated [[Strongheart halfling|strongheart]] [[halfling]] farmers, fishers, and [[copper]]smiths. The island's only permanent non-halfling resident was [[Belathra Kyndle]], the proprietor of the Brazen Buck.
